item.title: Raichur farmers demand to end paddy curbs
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur farmers demand to end paddy curbsRaichur: Members of the Karnataka State Farmers' Association held a demonstration on Thursday, disrupting traffic near the Krishna Bridge to protest against Telangana's restrictions on paddy transportation from Karnataka. The price disparity between regions prompted farmers to seek Telangana markets, where paddy fetches Rs 2,500 per quintal plus a Rs 500 incentive, while the Raichur market offers less than Rs 2,100, according to Chamarasa Malipatil, the o...]]>
item.author: Tnn
